title.rendered: Smashed baby potato and banger salad

content.rendered:
Smashed baby potato and banger salad

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 packet Fry’s Wood Smoked Breakfast Bangers (6 x 50g), cut into thin slices
15ml (1 Tbsp) oil
700g baby potatoes, boiled and smashed with a fork
250ml (1 cup) frozen peas, added to the warm potatoes
30ml (2 Tbsp) chopped chives or spring onions
10 cherry tomatoes halved
250ml (1 cup) vegan mayonnaise
Salt and pepper, to taste

Directions

Boil the baby potatoes until soft, drain and then smash with a fork so that each potato breaks into 2 or 3 pieces.

In a pan, fry the sliced Bangers in oil until it is quite crispy.

Mix the smashed potatoes and all the other ingredients in a bowl and stir until everything is combined.

Serve warm or cold.
